name: Warehouse Simulator 2018
description:
WASD to move

Space to jump

Shift to sprint

Right click pick up / put down objects

Left click throw / push objects

Esc to free the mouse cursor

Welcome to a game where you chuck boxes around a warehouse! If you love the gravity gun from half life, but have always wondered what it would be like in a warehouse management scenario... then this is that?? Try not to run out of space in the warehouse!

A game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 42.
